item.title: @elonmusk: üß† Why Neuralink is a game-changer for people with disabilities: For millions living with paralysis, ...
item.description: üß† Why Neuralink is a game-changer for people with disabilities: For millions living with paralysis, ALS, or severe motor/speech impairment, simple things like using a computer, communicating, or creating are impossible without constant help. Neuralink‚Äôs brain implant changes that‚Äîletting users control devices purely with thoughts. Noland, paralyzed below the shoulders from a diving accident, used to rely on a painful mouth stick and family caregivers. Now he independently browses, plays games like Civilization, and studies math, philosophy, & languages daily‚Äîreclaiming his autonomy and planning to return to school. Alex, quadriplegic after a car crash, lost his passion for designing auto parts. With Neuralink, he‚Äôs back to 3D CAD modeling, graphics, and even coding‚Äîpushing creative boundaries again. Brad, in late-stage ALS and unable to speak/move, was trapped indoors by unreliable eye-tracking tech. Now he communicates outdoors, attends his kid‚Äôs soccer games, and dreams of travel. This isn‚Äôt sci-fi. Real patients are already living more independent, connected lives. Future steps: robotic arms, speech restoration, even vision. Neuralink restores dignity, freedom, and hope. It‚Äôs one of the most important advancements for the disabled today.

item.title: @elonmusk: I can't imagine any other president fixing the massive fraud problem. First, he had to dismantle the...
item.description: I can't imagine any other president fixing the massive fraud problem. First, he had to dismantle the DEI mind virus. Second, he had to not be in on the scams, directly or indirectly. Third, you need balls of steel to block these good-sounding-but-corrupt schemes.

item.title: @elonmusk: Two Somali sisters living next door to each other in tax-payer funded housing can make $387,000 per ...
item.description: Two Somali sisters living next door to each other in tax-payer funded housing can make $387,000 per annum by looking after each other's 4 children. If they have 8 children each, they make $774,000. We are paying for our ethnic replacement.

item.title: @elonmusk: See for yourself: It's impossible to ignore the overlap of states where > illegal immigrants can get...
item.description: See for yourself: It's impossible to ignore the overlap of states where > illegal immigrants can get state-funded medicaid > photo id is *not* required to vote > the state voted blue in 2024 Anyone can see this creates a perverse incentive system for politicians to cheat. If we don't pass a federal voter ID law - and crack down on fraud like never before - it will be impossible to trust our electoral process ___ California Minnesota New York Illinois Oregon Washington Colorado ... etc

item.title: @elonmusk: üá∫üá∏ ICE CRACKDOWN IN MINNESOTA: OVER 500 ARRESTS TO START 2026 A sweeping immigration enforcement cam...
item.description: üá∫üá∏ ICE CRACKDOWN IN MINNESOTA: OVER 500 ARRESTS TO START 2026 A sweeping immigration enforcement campaign is underway in Minnesota as part of "Operation Metro Surge," with ICE arresting hundreds of undocumented individuals across the state. More than 500 arrests have already been made in early January, targeting people with prior deportation orders, fraud ties, or criminal records. Arrests have been confirmed at sites including a Hennepin County building in Minnetonka and a construction site in Chanhassen, with particular focus on Somali communities. Analysts say 2026 could break last year‚Äôs record for deportations under Trump‚Äôs immigration policies. Sources:@EricLDaugh

item.title: @elonmusk: Today I sent Secretary Simon a letter demanding records pertaining to Minnesota‚Äôs ‚Äúvouching‚Äù system ...
item.description: Today I sent Secretary Simon a letter demanding records pertaining to Minnesota‚Äôs ‚Äúvouching‚Äù system for voter registration, pursuant to my authority under the Civil Rights Act of 1960. This system seems facially inconsistent with the Help America Vote Act of 2002. We‚Äôll see!
